In confident expectation of the crown of life, the battle shout of this great warrior comes down along the lines to us, seeming to rob even 
                                                                           39
death of its triumph. Those who will dare to be true to principle and live for God and the future immortal life, who will not submit to the forms, customs, and ideas of this corrupt age, will not be understood by the world, any more than Christ was known and understood. But they are understood in heaven; their names are recorded in the Lamb's book of life. 


     Battle Creek, Mich., Nov. 7, 1879.
